alert.note: Alert for Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 8:31PM CDT until April 28 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Red Willow County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 831 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Danbury, or 8 miles southeast of McCook, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. Locally heavy rainfall is possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Indianola. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
